attributes.action: Impose a windfall tax at their marginal tax rate on all members of parliament and ex-members of parliament who have benefited from the second home allowance since its introduction.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Members of parliament have wilfully exploited this allowance, which was introduced in the 1980’s, and their exemption from tax on benefits in kind to feather their own nests.  Taxing the benefit in this manner will ensure that those who have exploited the system the most will pay the most.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
